content: But given a lot of the indications and conversations we've had with customers, we're confident that the sales demand will continue to be very strong and that our internal initiatives to improve the delivery and time lines for delivery of charging infrastructure will also dramatically improve in the year, further enabling growth in our deliveries. So, Point A and then Point B, as you mentioned, also the pricing actions we've taken because we have a lot of detail about the individual customers and the times of delivery and we can look into the points in the future where the price we expect to realize in ASPs will be increased it gives us that confidence of being positive gross margin on a unit basis second half of next year.
